entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Blanc-Sablon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:06 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -25.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 06:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -25.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -34
Dewpoint: -29.5°C
Wind: NNE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight then snow. Wind east 30 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023
